name: Slumbering Suburbs
description:
Welcome to a sleepy neighborhood where night will fall and everyone will soon be fast asleep. Some dreamers need some help to get a good night's rest. Help them along in their dream by completing various tasks. They'll be sure to be thankful for the help in the morning!

  • Keyboard Controls
    • Up
      • W/Spacebar
    • Down
      • S
    • Left
      • A
    • Right
      • D
    • Primary
      • K
    • Secondary
      • L
    • Start
      • Enter
  • Controller Controls
    • Up
    • Down
    • Left
    • Right
    • Primary
      • A/X/Nintendo  B
    • Secondary
      • B/O/Nintendo A
